## colorManipulator.getContrastRatio() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

### colorManipulator.getContrastRatio() function

Calculates the contrast ratio between two colors.

Formula: https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/G17.html\#G17-tests

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function getContrastRatio(foreground: string, background: string, canvas?: string): number;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { colorManipulator } from '@grafana/data';
const { getContrastRatio } = colorManipulator;
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  foreground | <code>string</code> | CSS color, i.e. one of: \#nnn, \#nnnnnn, rgb(), rgba(), hsl(), hsla() |
|  background | <code>string</code> | CSS color, i.e. one of: \#nnn, \#nnnnnn, rgb(), rgba(), hsl(), hsla() |
|  canvas | <code>string</code> | A CSS color that alpha based backgrounds blends into |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

A contrast ratio value in the range 0 - 21.
